contents:
WSJ又挖中共暗中勾搭川川。。。

https://www.wsj.com/articles/political-donors-linked-to-china-won-access-to-trump-gop-11592925569

Political Donors Linked to China Won Access to Trump, GOP

Hundreds of thousands of dollars in political donations opened doors in Washington for Chinese nationals with high-level ties


公正的說，這很正常，中共本來就兩手準備，如果當年川川輸了，民主黨上台，中共一樣有可以接觸到高層的lobbyist。
但是實際看到這則內文，各種細節，再結合這幾年搞出來的作秀大戲，說辭，還是一瞬被噁心到。= =
